mapper.insert: insert into pet_notice (n_num, n_title, n_content, n_created) values (#{n_num},#{n_title},#{n_content},#{n_created})
mapper.select: select n_num, n_title, n_content, to_char(n_created,'yyyy.MM.dd') n_created from pet_notice order by n_created desc
select n_num, n_title, n_content, to_char(n_created,'yyyy.MM.dd') n_created from pet_notice where n_num=#{n_num}
